summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Sewer Utility; directing the City Engineer to recompute and adjust certain special sewer connection charges heretofore collected pursuant to R.C.W. 35.67.310 and Ordinance No. 85317 of the City of Seattle, as amended by Ordinance No. 88645 and by Ordinance No. 93837 and to make partial refunds thereof and making an appropriation from the Sewer Fund therefor.
